name: DrinkingBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Drinking Buddy...What TIME IS IT?”
”Alexa, open Drinking Buddy”
”Whisper, what time is it?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drinking buddy
des:
Drinking Buddy does a "Shot Time" cheer for you when it's time to take a shot...but you have to ask it, "What TIME IS IT??"

You can also ask Drinking Buddy to "Whisper what time is it?" and it will whisper the cheer to you. 

The skill will also provide a few funny responses suggesting that Drinking Buddy is bored with you if you are not asking it "What time is it?"

Enjoy and Cheers!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
